discourse_list.title: How are the Grants Alpha Rounds going?

content.content: I like synthesizing information, so I put together this summary of the alpha rounds from this post and dune dashboards @ccerv1 put together.  Past Rounds     Project Dates Matching Pool Crowdfund Donations Crowdfund Unique Donors Dune Dashboard     UNICEF Dec 9 - 21, 2022 50 ETH 67.52Ξ + $14,788 DAI 15,507 dune   Fantom Dec 12, 2022 - Jan 2, 2023 125,000 FTM 294,299 FTM 16,344 dune     Other KPIS If anyone has any information on how the rounds went (What were the learnings? Were customers happy with it? Did it get sybil attacked?  What are the other core KPIs?), feel free to post it below.  Upcoming Rounds     Project Dates     Gitcoin Jan 17 - 31, 2023   Optimism January 31 to February 10, 2023   Alchemix TBC     Alpha test timeline  Screen Shot 2022-12-06 at 22.41.311490×600 12.6 KB   Are posts like this helpful? If this post is helpful to people and attracts discussion of how the product rollout is going, maybe I’ll keep it updated in the future.
